list_definition.definition: the part of an object by which it may be held or grasped

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I’ve broken the handle off this cup
You’ve got to turn the handle in order to open the door.

list_definition.definition: to touch or hold with the hand

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Please wash your hands before handling food.

list_definition.definition: to control, manage or deal with

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He’ll never make a good teacher – he doesn’t know how to handle children.

list_definition.definition: to buy or sell; to deal in

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I’m afraid we do not handle such goods in this shop.

list_definition.mean_english: đối xử như thế nào đó
